8
9 NotificationCallback::NotificationCallback(
10 const status_changed_cb_t&& cb
11 ) {
12 set_on_status_changed_cb(std::move(cb));
13 }
14
15
16 HRESULT NotificationCallback::Notify(
17 BMDNotifications topic,
18 uint64_t param1,
19 uint64_t param2
20 ) {
21 // Topic can be status or preferences. We are not interested in the latter
22 if (topic != bmdStatusChanged)
23 return S_OK;
24
25 if (_on_status_changed_cb) {
26 _on_status_changed_cb(static_cast<StatusID>(param1), param2);
27 }
28
29 return S_OK;
30 }
31
32
33 void NotificationCallback::set_on_status_changed_cb(
34 const status_changed_cb_t&& on_status_changed_cb
35 ) {
36 _on_status_changed_cb = on_status_changed_cb;
37 }
38
39}
